raw_body: Dearly beloved husband of Yvonne, loving father of Yasmin (USA), Yohan (UK), Jeremy (Pan Asia Bank), Ryan (D.R. Foods) and Sharon (USA), grandfather of Amanda, Devon, Andrena, Jehan, Eshan, Dulshani, Dilshan, Denahi, Mario, Dilan, Dewmini, Ashton and Kayton, father-in-law of Aubrey (USA), Hemanthi (St. Bridget’s Convent), Amara and Romesh (USA), passed away peacefully on 21st March 2024. Cortege leaves residence at No. 54/29, Pepiliyana Road, Ned
